institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 30 (Operation of Training Courses, etc.)
contents: Article 30 (Operation of training courses, etc.) ① If a joint training center conducts training according to a business plan, it may report training implementation pursuant to Article 8 of the 「Employer Vocational Competency Development and Training Support Regulations」 without a training consignment contract or employment agreement. You can. ② In the case of a ‘training course with less than 10 days of training or less than 40 hours of training time,’ the joint training center must report a confirmed person, not a change report, notwithstanding paragraph 1. Newly established on April 25, 2023, ③ The joint training center follows the “Employer Vocational Competency Development Training Support Regulations” for matters not specified in these rules in relation to the operation of the training course.
